title: BREAK_BIDIRECTIONAL_CLOSENESS Operation
description: Removes mutual relationship components from both actor and target, cleaning up the bidirectional closeness relationship

actor_component_type.description: Component type to remove from actor, e.g., 'hugging:hugging'

target_component_type.description: Component type to remove from target, e.g., 'hugging:being_hugged'

additional_component_types_to_remove.description: Additional component types to remove from both entities

regenerate_descriptions.description: Whether to regenerate entity descriptions after relationship removal
